title: Wreck-It Ralph
writer: Rich Moore, Phil Johnston, Jim Reardon
actors: John C. Reilly, Jack McBrayer, Jane Lynch
plot: Ralph is tired of playing the role of a bad guy and embarks on a journey to become a video game hero. But he accidentally lets loose a deadly enemy that threatens the entire arcade.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 33 wins & 42 nominations total
